original_text: King Rehoboam sent a man called Adoniram to talk to the Israelite people. Adoniram had authority over the men who had to work for Rehoboam. But the Israelites threw stones at Adoniram and they killed him. So King Rehoboam quickly got into his chariot and he escaped to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 역꾼의 감독 아도람을 보냈더니 온 이스라엘이 그를 돌로 쳐죽인지라 르호보암 왕이 급히 수레에 올라 예루살렘으로 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: King Rehoboam sent a man called Adoniram
to talk to the Israelite people
over the men who had to work for Rehoboam
sentences.korean_translation: 르호보암을 위해 일해야 하는 남자들에 대한

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites threw stones at Adoniram
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 사람들은 아도니람에게 돌을 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: So King Rehoboam quickly got into his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 르호보암 왕은 빨리 그의 전차에 탔습니다
